WFSnav Demo

JavaScript plugin

If you’re looking to buy the best activity tracker or hybrid smartwatch, you want to make sure you find one that works with your life. All our fitness trackers and hybrid smartwatches help you meet your goals by tracking steps, runs, swim and sleep automatically, and feature classic styles that work for your workouts and for your everyday life.

Plugin benefits:

  • Plugin weight - javascript - 11,7 KB
  • Smooth transition to blocks.
  • Class on the active menu item.
  • Closing the mobile menu with further moving.

WFSfixednav

JavaScript plugin

Sometimes there are situations where the menu is not on top but in the content. When the user scrolls to the menu, you need to make it Sticky.
